mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWS (CASHFLOWSSEQNO, CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, CASHFLOWS2007SGMTSEQNO) values (#{CashFlowsSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CashFlowsBsSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CashFlows2007SgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select CASHFLOWSSEQNO, CASHFLOWSBSSGMTSEQNO, CASHFLOWS2007SGMTSEQNO from PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWS
